author: pderop
msg: FELIX-3680: Don't use anymore a LogReaderService because the LogReaderService is handled in
a dedicate LogService thread, and because of this, we can't log the actual thread of the
logged message. The ComponentTestBase is now implemeting a light LogService, which logs
messages asynchronously, but the thread of the log is preserved.

author: pderop
msg: FELIX-3680: Prefixed all test components name with the test package, in order to
avoid potential conflicts with other tests which might have same component names (A/B/C ...)
